title: Ordinance No 187 Series of 2020, Barangay Curfew
description:
In accordance with the barangay's commitment to ensuring the safety and well-being of all residents, we would like to inform everyone about the implementation of a barangay curfew effective starting December 16, 2024.
The curfew is being enacted to maintain public order, reduce incidents of crime, and ensure the safety of our community members, especially our children and elderly. It will also help in minimizing the spread of any health risks or emergencies.

title: Peace and Order
description: The Barangay Peace and Order Enhancement Program is a community-based initiative designed to strengthen safety, security, and overall peace within Barangay Butnga. This project aims to address issues of crime, public disorder, and conflict within the community by implementing preventive measures, enhancing cooperation with local law enforcement, and promoting community engagement. The program will work towards creating a safer environment for all residents, fostering mutual respect, and building trust between the community and law enforcement agencies.

title: Prohibiting The Use of Plastic Bags Butnga
description: The Barangay Plastic Bag Ban Project is an initiative aimed at reducing plastic waste and promoting environmental sustainability within the barangay. The project seeks to prohibit the use of plastic bags in all retail and commercial establishments, encouraging the use of alternative, eco-friendly bags such as reusable, biodegradable, or cloth bags. By eliminating plastic bags, the barangay will contribute to reducing pollution, protecting wildlife, and improving the overall environmental health of the community.
